      • getFieldForPath

        @Loggable(value=0)
public static java.lang.reflect.Field getFieldForPath(java.util.Stack<java.lang.String> path,
                                                                          java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Object> fieldClass)
                                                                   throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method finds field in class according to it's path.
        Parameters:
        path - - Stack of Strings representing path in object
        fieldClass - - class in which we are searching for the field
        Returns:
        - field found in class
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs

      • isBigDataField

        @Loggable(value=0)
public static java.lang.Boolean isBigDataField(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
                                                            throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method to define if class's field is big data field(defined by annotation BigDataXmlElement).
        Parameters:
        field - - field to check if it is big data field
        Returns:
        - true if given field is big data field
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown when error occurs

      • isXmlRoot

        @Loggable(value=0)
public static boolean isXmlRoot(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Object> classToCheck,
                                                    java.lang.String rootElement)
        Method searches if given class has XmlRootElement and if XmlRootElement's name is the same as rootElement in input.
        Parameters:
        classToCheck - class to find XmlRootElement in
        rootElement - root element's name
        Returns:
        whether rootElement found as XmlRootElement in classToCheck

      • setBigDataFieldsToObject

        @Loggable(value=0)
public static void setBigDataFieldsToObject(java.util.List<BigDataElement> bigDataElements,
                                                                java.lang.Object obj)
                                                         throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method sets big data fields to given object. Big data elements are set according to paths that are defined in them.
        Parameters:
        bigDataElements - - list of big data elements to set
        obj - - object to which big data elements are set
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - throws if error occurs
